com.team41.boromi.controllers

Class BookRequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team41.boromi.controllers.BookRequestController

  • @Singleton
public class BookRequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Does some logic to grab books This is going to be some "dumb" logic. Basically, BookRequest stores the requester and requestee with the UUID. All book requests signify that there is an active request for that book. Deleting the request basically means "rejecting" and
